education.institution: Indian Institute of Information Technology (IIIT), Dharwad

work.name: International Business Machines (IBM)
work.summary: As a Salesforce Developer, gained valuable experience in the configuration and customization of Salesforce, including creating custom objects, defining record types, and implementing validation rules. My contributions were pivotal in optimizing our Salesforce environment for enhanced functionality and efficiency.

work.name: International Business Machines (IBM)
work.summary: Worked as a shadow resource to transform the management system for NextEra Energy's Florida Power and Light (FPL) division.

work.name: Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) BHU
work.summary: Worked on the project - "Design and Fabrication of a Brachytherapy Applicator" which is used in the treatement of cervical cancer.

publications.name: Tldsmi: Genetic Algorithm Based Network for Text Localization in Distorted Social Media Images

publications.name: Hope Speech Detection on Social Media Platforms
publications.summary: Pranjal Aggarwal, Jagrut Nemade, Shubham Sharma, Pasupuleti Chandana, Shankar Biradar and Sunil Saumya, Hope Speech Detection on Social Media Platforms, Book Chapter in "Cyber Crime in Social Media: Theory and Solutions(CCSM)", August 2022. DOI: https://doi.org/10.1201/9781003304180

publications.name: Random Decision Forest Approach for Mitigating SQL Injection Attacks

volunteer.summary: Lead organizer for the New York City branch of the People's Climate March, the largest climate march in history.
highlights: Awarded 'Climate Hero' award by Greenpeace for my efforts organizing the march.
Men of the year 2014 by Time magazine

awards.title: Nobel Prize in Physics
awards.summary: The Nobel Prizes are five separate prizes that, according to Alfred Nobel's will of 1895, are awarded to 'those who, during the preceding year, have conferred the greatest benefit to humankind.'
